user.name: Nguyen Duc Tham
user.desc: With good logical thinking and eagerness to learn, always cultivate more knowledge to improve yourself and work hard. I look forward to working at the company as a front-end intern. I will complete the assigned tasks well, along with that, I will always learn and hone more soft skills and professional skills to be able to improve myself and strive to become a full-time employee at the company. company after three months of internship.

contact.address: 18/17 Phu Kieu - Phu Diem - Bac Tu liem - Ha Noi

posts.title: How to use Bootstrap library
posts.content: If you want to quickly create a website without writing tons of CSS from scratch, then Bootstrap 4 might be the framework you’re looking for. In this course, you’ll see how Bootstrap makes it easy to layout and create interactive and responsive sites.

projects.name: Photoshop by CC 2020
projects.content: Its developers define it as a “scripting or programming language that allows you to implement complex things on web pages.” JavaScript makes web pages more dynamic and user-friendly so that they respond to visitors' actions. Or, to put it another way, JavaScript makes web pages interactive
